original_text: It will be very bad for the armies of other nations! They are making a noise like the sea in a storm! They are as loud as powerful waves! It will be very bad for the armies of other nations! They are making a noise like the sea in a storm! They are as loud as powerful waves!
korean_text: 슬프다 많은 민족이 소동하였으되 바다 파도가 치는 소리 같이 그들이 소동하였고 열방이 충돌하였으되 큰 물이 몰려옴 같이 그들도 충돌하였도다

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for the armies of other nations!
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 나라들의 군대에게는 매우 나쁜 일이 있을 것이다!

sentences.original_text: They are making a noise like the sea in a storm!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 폭풍우 치는 바다와 같은 소리를 내고 있다!

sentences.original_text: They are as loud as powerful waves!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 강력한 파도처럼 큰 소리를 낸다!

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for the armies of other nations!
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 나라들의 군대에게는 매우 나쁜 일이 있을 것이다!

sentences.original_text: They are making a noise like the sea in a storm!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 폭풍우 치는 바다와 같은 소리를 내고 있다!

sentences.original_text: They are as loud as powerful waves!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 강력한 파도처럼 큰 소리를 낸다!
